        public void pointChanged(PointValueTime oldValue,
                         PointValueTime newValue)
        Description copied from interface: DataPointListener
        This method is called every time the point gets a value that is different from its previous value (except for its initialization). This includes when the point is set, if the set changes the point's value.

      • pointInitialized

        public void pointInitialized()
        Description copied from interface: DataPointListener
        This method is called for all existing listeners when the point is initialized. Note that it is not called for listeners that have begun listening to an already-initialized point.
        Specified by:
        pointInitialized in interface DataPointListener
